attributes.action: Stop the advertising of Human Trafficking
attributes.additional_details:
We call upon the government to take action in stoping the advertisment of Human Trafficking in newspapers and magazines. The amount of iilegal trafficking is rising in the UK and advertisment is the main problem in attracting people to secret brothels and parlours by putting flyers and leaflets in telephone booths.

Sign now and we can stop the exploitation of people in the UK due to these advertisments.
